name: Seven Kingdoms Dragon
description:
Hey Friends! Join the deadly running game today to conquer the kingdom with dragon. Enter to the seven kingdom’s dragon and make the dragon your best friend. Let’s go with him on the endless running journey. Avoid the deadly hurdles on the way to collect the coins. Win multiple rewards and unlock the other interesting levels. Conquer the land by defeating the monsters and become the super legend.

Win magical gems and have endless running with princess in the deserts, jungles and temples for free. Give training to your dragon right now and start the running and jumping journey. The super action arcade is around you and you can garb all the running fun.

Have awesome kingdom and the dragon with fire in HD graphics. Enjoy the fantastic sound effects and super animations for free. Download for free and enter to the legendary kingdom to become the legend in deadly running game.

- Have awesome running tracks
- Get multiple rewards to unlock the other levels
- Enjoy leaderboard to have race with friends
- Super sound effects and HD graphics
- Play online and offline with friends
- Download it now for free

Be the part of the deadly running game and have fun with “Seven Kingdom’s Dragon”
